评论详情: This top is so comfortable and pretty.  The sleeves add a dressy appeal to the standard sweatshirt making it perfect for casual wear with jeans or dressing up black slacks.  I have 2 so far and plan to order more.  These tops wash well and come out of the dryer fresh and ready to wear.  Definitely a must have!
The caramel colored is more of a chocolate brown. I potentially am returning it just because the color is totally off.
Soft and comfortable. Wondering if it will pull when washed.
Warm, soft, cute I love it but you can see your bra. Not sure why, it’s thick material but you’ll have to wear another layer if you don’t want your bra showing.
This top is super soft on the inside.  Feels like a mink blanket!  Can wear with leggings, jeans or dress pants!  Love the quality and color of this!  Fits TTS.  Wearing small.

评论概述: Very soft fabric and very comfortable
评论详情: Very pretty. However, if you're looking for the length, it's not long at all. It's the average length. I'm only 4'11 and it just comes under the waist. Not As long as I would have liked. If you going to wear leggings you need it to be longer. The material's very nice. Very soft not thin material. Well made
Good quality. Very soft
I was pleasantly surprised when I received this sweater. It is soft, comfortable and the mix of textures elevates this sweater.  Great buy for the price!
The top fitted perfectly. I ordered the pretty pink top as shown.  But I got more of a dull pink.  I was disappointed.  I’m keeping the too

So comfy and soft. The main fabric is like a thin fleece inside and outside. It is really soft. This is true to size. I am wearing a Medium. The sweater sleeves are great and a perfect length. I haven’t washed this yet but I don’t anticipate any shrinkage.  I really dislike when a shirt is too far up in your armpits. I just find it uncomfortable. This is borderline too high in my armpits but it stretches so it will be just fine.  Great price.
Love this buttery soft sweater! So cute and cozy on.

I purchased this shirt because I liked the way it looked with the quilted sleeves.  When the item arrived,  it was way better than I anticipated.  The material was soft and well made, the designs on the sleeves were beautifully crafted.  The size was pretty on par with the sizing description too! I will definitely be ordering more in various colors.
Very comfortable. I ordered a medium, I usually get a large.
So soft and so cute!
After first couple wearings, pilling occurs. Sign of low-quality yarn.
Not sized for larger chested. Tight in chest and huge on hips. I didn’t care for the material. It seemed kind of cheap.

This is a beautiful top. Wonderful quality! I am 5’7 and 125 pounds. The small fits exactly right. The arm length is perfect and it lands just under my butt. I’m definitely ordering another one, but I’m going to order a medium for an oversized look/fit to look like the model in the pictures. So super soft. I want like 10 of these.

Love this shirt. Bought the red and the cream colors, and they were so nice, I just ordered the coffee. Ordered xxl as I wear long underwear in winter months and it is perfect in weight as top layer and not too bulky under a coat. The length is perfect for leggings. The fabric is nice, very soft, washes well, colors beautiful. I hang dry as I do with all my tops and they dry wrinkle free.

Soft and ok fit but it’s not what is pictured. The rivets in the sleeves don’t stand out as much and it already has a small hole in the top corner after 1 wash. Quality seems cheap and it was too expensive to not hold up this fast.
Size runs really small.

I really like these. I ordered 3 different colors and they are really comfortable. They are like a sweatshirt with sweater sleeves. The sizes were true too. I sized up one size because I wanted them a little big and it was perfect.
Fits true to size and is a great fabric. Cozy for wintry weather.

Good material.  Soft and comfy

I bought 2 of these sweaters (1 black, 1 grey), hoping they’d be a staple in my closet: however the sleeves were too short for me, so my daughter took them over. I liked the thickness of the sweater, and pricing is decent, but fit was off.
Came very wrinkled as they store and ship it in a tiny plastic bag.  Washed once and the lace on sleeve ripped.
Extremely comfortable and looks awesome!  Nice and warm.
Sweater feels really soft. But the hole in it pisses me off!
The shirt is comfortable and it is made of high quality fabric. The picture shows a medium size.

I was surprised on how soft and comfortable this shirt/ sweater is! It washed easily and dried without wrinkling. I plan to buy some of the other colors too as it’s a quick throw on and go out; looks great with jeans.
so far i have 3 sweater sweatshirts and Iove them all...size and color perfect for me..

I agree with another review that the J-Purple color is more a burgundy color than a dark raspberry pink. The shirt also left fabric balls on other clothing while wearing it. This shirt also bled color onto my other clothes in the wash. It is comfortable to wear and I love the details on the sleeves but it isn’t as warm as I was hoping for.
This is the softest shirt I have ever worn!!! The fit is perfect for a tunic, a little oversized. So Comfy!!!!!

Okay, so I just recently bought this and I couldn’t wait to try it on…especially once I felt the material! I love how it provides just the right amount of thickness so it’s not too flow-y in the winter but also won’t make you sweat like crazy indoors (at least I didn’t). I’m normally a size XS but the smallest they had was Small so I went with that. It’s a little baggy on me but I still love it.
This shirt was to long in the torso for me. I felt like I was swimming in it.
Nice soft top.  I ordered and XL.  I am 5'7, 190 pounds.  It fits well.
Horrible delivery time, poor quality and not as described.
Very cute, nice fit, casual.
SOFTEST fabric everrrr!
My favorite new shirt. It is so soft, and fits well. Not too thin or thick. Will definitely buy another shirt in a different color. I love it. ❤️
I thought I was buying a sweater type material, nope it was some sort of stretchy material. Will not buy again

I love this shirt! It feels like a sweatshirt, but it’s nice enough to wear to work. I ordered my normal size and it fit perfect. It’s so comfortable! The material is thick like my other sweatshirts but it looks like a blouse I would wear to work. I’ve worn and washed it multiple times and the material has held up well with no pilling. This shirt is a great value!
Not as roomy as I thought it would be Sweater is soft and not too thick Good value for the money
Love this shirt! Quality made at a reasonable price and it fits nicely. I will definitely be buying more of them
Just the fabric weight and quality I was looking for in a weekend shirt. Comfortable, nice loose but not baggy style and no pilling. Works well for my style.

This is my 2nd Saloogoe brand shirt and I love them both. Nice enough to wear to work, but casual with jeans or leggings. The material is super soft, and stays soft after washing, but it's light as well. Not heave like a sweatshirt or sweater. The cableknit sleeves are even thin, but good quality.
Great color, fits well, thick, and comfortable. It will show creases and marks on the shirt itself. The texture on the sleeves make is a little nicer than just a plain sweatshirt.
Very cute with textured sleeves but starting to pill after a few washes.
Sent back to small but I liked it
Material is soft … feels cozy.
This sweater is thin, but it’s so soft. Item it TTS and color is accurate.
This is so comfortable and looks really nice!
So soft, perfect fit. I want every color!!

So comfy, soft, and warm.  I love the cable stitched sleeves ... makes it look more like a sweater than a sweatshirt, but it's such a soft fabric that feels like I'm snuggled up in a blanket.  I'm 5'7, 160 lbs. and it fits me perfectly but hopefully it won't shrink when it's washed, or it might feel a little snug.  Fingers crossed.
Soft and comfy; true to size
Love this sweater. The material is soft and very comfortable.  Great sweater for winter.
It is thin material but so extremely soft. It is longer. So covered my butt in leggings
I really like this sweatshirt; however, if in between sizes, size up. I am a true medium and it was a little snug.
Did not fit. To tight everywhere on my waist, shoulders and bust.

I really like this sweatshirt.  Like the description says, it is light weight, very soft and comfortable.  The XL fit just right.  I ordered the dark green.  It was a little darker than I expected, but still very nice.

I wanted to love this sweater. It was a gorgeous color and super soft but it fit weird. Tight through shoulders chest and arms- super loose and big through torso and stomach area. Looked weird tucked, since it was tight across the shoulders/chest.
Shirt looks very nice.  Can be casual or matched with dress pants for work.  Comfortable material.  Able to wash and dry and dryer and no shrinkage.  Loved the color options.

It's warm enough and fits so well.  It appears to be made very well.  I have noticed that it is the perfect top to pair with either leggings or jeans. I have worn this one time to a company Christmas party & went to put it on this evening & it has a hole.  So disappointed b/c it’s a great, super soft, comfortable shirt that looks dressed up.
Arm is starting to get multiple holes after being worn on my 3x. Very cheap material. I bought a swing me in another color that I will now return.
So cute and soft. I’m pleased with the quality and how it washes up.
I love this shirt. It’s cozy and warm and fits great.
I absolutely love this sweater.  It is so soft and fits perfectly.
I bought it as a gift for my sister and she wears at all the time.  It's soft and warm. It's good quality. Highly recommended

This is a great sweatshirt! Not too thin, not too heavy! The material is very soft. I’m 5’10” and the length and sleeve length is ample. Hard to find a shirt that meets my every need!!! I’ll be ordering more!

The color is lovely and it has a wonderful minky feel. The cuffs and torso are so plush and soft. It is decently thick, definitely keeps me cozy warm. I haven't had any issues with static cling, the fit is comfortable and relaxed.

评论概述: Stylish, But Not Quite a True Sweater
评论详情: The Saloogoe sweatshirt with cable knit sleeves is sorta soft, and the color matches the photo perfectly. The knit sleeves are nice but not as delicate or artistic as others I’ve purchased. The fit is just right, but the material (90% polyester) feels less like a traditional sweater. It’s not poor quality, but it’s not what you’d expect from a sweater. Be cautious when ironing, as the fabric can melt easily. I wouldn’t purchase this again.
Size is accurate. Washed well with no pilling even after second wash. Love the feel of the material.
Lightweight and comfortable
Do not buy this. It’s so cute and comfortable, but the sleeves unravel in less than one wear. I didn’t even snag it on anything and it’s coming apart.

Didn’t want something that’s form fitting. But this shirt is tight. Not loose at all. Which is fine if that how you like your clothes. It’s good quality. Fleece lined and warm. But for anyone with a little pouch area this shirt will show it.
Love this sweater! It is so soft and comfortable.
I love it. Fits perfect and feels so soft.
